verbs.description: KANSAS CITY , Mo. -- [ARG0: Dozens of hopeful people] [V: celebrated] [ARG1: a promise of peace] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARGM-LOC: at Missouri 's Korean War Memorial] [ARGM-TMP: after President Trump told Americans on Wednesday that North Korea is no longer a nuclear threat] .

KANSAS CITY , Mo. -- Dozens of hopeful people celebrated a promise of peace Thursday at Missouri 's Korean War Memorial after [ARG0: President Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: Americans] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARG1: that North Korea is no longer a nuclear threat] .
